text: Hi People! Has anyone wondered if there is an option to format the text within a form field. Airtable for example has a nice option here: <https://support.airtable.com/hc/en-us/articles/360044794573-Rich-text-in-forms-and-app>

Morning guys, is it possible to add blog tags to the search listing results page? If so do I have to do this via API? Just so theres no confusion, to the actual listing item itself. I can see we have title and description along with featured image but nothing for the tags.Â (edited)
